item.title: GoogleCTF Beginner's Quest 2019 - Government Agriculture Network
item.author: shiny-labs@kylma.fr (shiny-labs)
item.description: Description Well it seems someone can’t keep their work life and their home life separate. You vaguely recall on your home planet, posters put up everywhere that said “Loose Zips sink large commercial properties with a responsibility to the shareholders.” You wonder if there is a similar concept here. Using the credentials to access this so-called Agricultural network, you realize that SarahH was just hired as a vendor or contract worker and given access that was equivalent.
